tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Sujoy Dasgupta is the reason of our happiness after spending years of sleepless nights. We tried for IVF-ICSI which failed for the first time, but we never lost hope on the doctor. We attempted for IVF again under him and on 6th Nov 2023, we were blessed with a baby boy.

We started the treatment under Dr. Dasgupta during the starting of 2022. He shared the pros and cons of all treatment procedures and presented us the choices for IUI and IVF. His detailed information, especially considering my advanced maternal age, helped us to opt for IVF. He also shared a book authored by him regarding details of IVF pregnancy during the visit which clarified almost all the doubts and any questions that we had.

The second IVF attempt was progressing smoothly till ovum pickup. We were planning to freeze the embryo and plan for pregnancy later, but doctor suggested for immediate Embryo Transfer within 3 days of pickup, considering the quality of the embryo and the history of the failure of embryo formation during the first attempt. Despite the sudden pregnancy decision was hard to take still we decided to trust him. The pregnancy progressed smoothly till 3rd trimester, although low PAPP-A was detected in NT scan (signifying the growth restriction of placenta). The baby was detected with late onset IUGR in the early 3rd trimester. My son was even not required to be admitted in NICU and stayed with me throughout the hospitalization.

He is a patient centric doctor who also considers the financial aspects of his patients, which proved to be more helpful to us as we are from a middle class background. Throughout the journey, he explained the pros and cons of most of the medicines and the treatment transparently, never hiding any facts.

Thank you sir for your priceless consultations and guidances. Our dream has come true after long years of struggle.
reply_text: Thank you so much

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We came to know about Dr. Sujoy Dasgupta from various web reviews. Impressed with such positive reviews and academic excellence of the doctor, we visited him with the intent to conceive. First visit was highly satisfying. Doctor explained everything beautifully and suggested to see him after a few months. On trying for 6-8 months without result, he made necessary prognosis, diagnosis, lab tests and everything came all right. He prescribed a medicine (Ovulation Induction method) and we conceived within 2-3 months. We became joyous at this and without a second thought we kept consulting him throughout the pregnancy period. Sir was extremely patient friendly, and caring. Interaction with Sir has always removed our stress/ worries and filled with positivity and confidence. He never prescribed excess medicines or tests. We followed his advices meticulously throughout the period. He never bothered to reply to our messages whenever we needed to discuss. 
The best thing we found in Sir is his paying sincere attention to his patients, and explaining the potential risks, possible benefits and remedies. We had some complications like Hypothyroidism, Obstetrics Cholestasis during the period. However, those were medically managed by Sir and everything came out to our expectations. We are blessed with a healthy baby boy two days back at RSV hospital in the ****** ******* *** seasoned hands of Doctor Dasgupta. We are extremely indebted to you Sir for giving the best gift (lifeline) of our lives. Not only the surgery was really painless as felt by my wife, the entire journey has been hassle-free. The goodness and bounty seen in Sir is really rare nowadays and we are extremely fortunate to have received the same. We once again profusely thank you sir for everything. Pray you reach to the zenith of success. My sincere thanks also to the folks who shared their beautiful experiences about Sir and helped us to know about him. From our experience, we can proclaim without hesitations that *** ** *** ** *** **** obstetricians & gynaecologists & infertility experts whom one can rely upon blindly. Sir is very responsible and takes all round care of the patients.
reply_text: It's really difficult to say the word "thank you" to someone who has not only given a mind-blowing review but also kept faith on us through thick and thin. Really we have no words to express our gratitude.

review: The Doc doesn't share his ideas or diagnosis* ********** **** ******** **** ***** ***** *** Waiting time is too long. He does Mass Genatlia checkups of male patients and the same with female patients for TVS ***** ** ******** ********* ********** *** ***************

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Myself Dibyendu and have experienced a bad day today (07.03.24) in Genome clinic, kolkata . I went to Dr Sujay's (Genome clinic), first of all I was told on the phone that the consultancy fee will be less ( 1200 Rs for husband and wife both) but after going there clinic charged1200. Still, there was no problem in it. I was given a time of 1 o'clock, but Dr. had to leave the house and he directly told me angrily that why have you come now, I cannot see now *** ***** **** **** **** ** * **** * **** *** ** **** ** *** ********* I had my semen test report,  which I had tested in *** ** **** semen analysis lab, kolkata, in which I had spent 1600 rupees, but till then I did not know that by going to a clinic, I would have to test again and spend money. The doctor neither saw that report nor gave any suggestions, didn't even ask anything and just wrote in his pad for a semen test in their lab only and will consult with both of husband and wife.And in just 5 minutes, without giving any suggestions, asked to leave. I took out my time from the office and came here just to spend 1200 without any benefit .*** ****** * ***** ** **** **** ** **** ******* ** ** ** *** ** *** * *** ******* *** ********* ** *** ** ****** ** ******* ** Anyway I have to do my test elsewhere but the behaviour of Dr. was not good. We are the patients and if you have no time to see your patients properly kindly tell your agents or receptionist not to allow any patient for consultant in your out time. 1200 rs gone for no reason..its a big amount for me ** ******* ***** ** ********* ****** ***** ** *** again you are told to do the same report. Thanks
reply_text:
Your semen analysis was done from a laboratory which is not specialized in infertility treatment. Moreover, scientifically, a single semen analysis is not at all reliable and no treatment can be done based on a single semen analysis. Therefore, it is always advisable to do semen analysis from infertility laboratory to confirm whether it is actually good or bad. Many times we have seen the second semen analysis report is completely different. 
In any infertility clinic of the World, both husband and wife need to come together. Even if there is problem in husband's sperm only, the wife need to be seen by the infertility specialist who will discuss the treatment ONLY after seeing reports of both. In our centre, the charge Rs 1200 includes 
1. Consultation charges for both husband and wife 
2. Psychological counseling, which is mandatory for any infertility clinic as per Govt of India 
3. TVS ultrasound for wife.
You paid the charge and we offered you all these but you refused treatment and any test for your wife.
You wanted to act very smart and you thought only your report will be checked. Medicine practice has its rule and you can NOT change the way of treatment. We requested you to do evaluation of your wife which would have been done without spending anything extra. But you refused that. You repeatedly insisted on medicines. Before giving any medicine we need to see whether medicine is actually needed. But you were very much stubborn and you thought you know everything of infertility treatment. 
We are thankful that our patients rely completely on us when they come to our clinic. 
I will advise you to write a book on infertility treatment where you can dictate how treatment should be done. Good luck.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: I had visited Doctor Sujay Dasgupta during 2016, he was a very good person back then, I revisited him today(01/07/2021) at the Bhagirathi Neotia Child care center at New Town. This time around I was completely shocked regarding the utter Unprofessional and unruly attitude of Dr. Dasgupta. He was in a hurry since the time our consultation started and kept saying he is getting late for some engagement that he has. ***** ** *** *** ******** **** *** **** *** *** **** *** ** **** ** ***** * **** ****** ** **** ******* **** ***** ******* *** for us he spared 5-7 minutes hardly. His behavior was very hostile, did not even speak with a courtesy **** ** ******** **** * ******* As a patient we expect the doctors to be understanding *** **** ****** ****** ** **** ** **** ** **** This is a reasonable expectation considering they are not providing consultation for free, we have paid their consultation fees and they should hear us out. Why should a patient suffer because of the doctor's own agenda or engagements. Why would the doctor agree to consult a patient if he knows he would be late for his affairs in the first place. Unruly rude behavior, way of speaking are some of the things i would like to point out about this doctor. ** *** *** ******** ** ***** *** ** *** ******* I am not sure why he treated us the way he did today, me and my wife are very disheartened with the kind of behavior Dr. Dasgupta showcased. We have reported the whole incident to the management team of Bhagirathi Neotia. * ****** * ******** ** *** ********** ******** **** ** **** ***** ** *** ************ ******* ******* ******* *** ******* ******** ** ********** *** ********** *** ********* ******** **** ** **** ** *** *** **** **** ** *** *** ** ** ******** ****** ********* **** ***** ********* * **** ***** **** ** *** ********* ********* * ***** ** ****** ** *** ********* ** *** **** * ********* **** *** ** **** *** **** **** *** **** *** **** ****** ** ****** ** * ************ ********
reply_text:
We are happy that most of our patients do not think like you. As you have mentioned, our Dr gave adequate time to all other patients except you. Some patients need extra time (even an hour) while in some other cases the consultation can be completed within 5 minutes.
Regarding your problem our Dr already reassured you that you did not have any big problem and advised some tests.
Then you showed tests and medicines advised by other doctors and asked for opinion on it. Nobody can judge the prescription of another doctor. We can not comment on tests advised by other doctors.
Even finally he requested that he was having an emergency (because we cannot endanger other patient's life when that patient requires URGENT medical attention). But you repeatedly asked to know the SPELLING OF EACH TEST advised by the doctor. The tests were clearly written in prescription and it did not require the doctor to spell the name of each test.
Therefore in future when you visit any doctor, please remember,
1) all patients may not get equal time in consultation. The time depends on the severity of the problem patient is suffering.
2) don't compete with other patients regarding time
3) don't ask the doctor to judge the prescription of another doctor. (You purposefully avoided explanation of this).
4) the spelling of the tests can be asked from the laboratory.
Good luck.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We started our journey in July, 2019. Then I found Dr. Sujoy Dasgupta Sir and we met our Doctor. He explained us each and every points needs to be taken care off and guided us. We were having full of queries and doubts in our mind. He was always with us in all the phases and helped us with the clarifications by understanding our medical history. What we specially liked that he always explained everything before the questions asked. We always found our mental satisfactions in every time we visits him.He was always available to clear our doubts in the WhatsApp and Phone at any point of time in a day and night.Dr. Sujoy Dasgupta Sir is a great human being and advisor in our journey. ** *** **** ***** ** **** *** *** ***** *** ** *** ******* *** ** ** **** ** *** **** * **** **** *** *** *************** ** ********Things are going well however the tough time started. We were so worried due to this global pandemic. Situation was very tough for us but our Doctor Sir explained us everything in detailed and helped us to understand all the pros and crons and ensure us to take the right decisions.Delivery happened little earlier than the scheduled planning due to some complications. Dr. Sujoy Dasgupta Sir hold our hands tightly in this challenging time and we are blessed with a healthy baby boy and cherishing the every moment. Now we are so happy and enjoying our parenthood from 6th April, 2020.Thank you for your part in our journey. We are so touched beyond words.Your kindness, sincere caring, and concern make everything better and are a great encouragement.We do pray to God for your success. We blindly believe you that makes the faith on you.Many many thanks to you and your team.This is our small story bound by Dr. Sujoy Dasgupta Sir.Aparna & Abhisek Pramanik
reply_text:
Dear Mr and Mrs Pramanik, Thanks a lot for penning down the details of your journey through thick and thin, in beautiful words. We believe that the patients have the right to take decision about their treatment and therefore, they should be fully informed about the details of their condition, reports and treatment options. Thank you for your unconditional faith on us from the very beginning.
Regarding Covid 19 pandemic, it was totally unexpected. We never anticipated such things. That's why we have not been able to provide the care according to our standard protocol. We have to omit many check up, tests and medicines just to avoid spreading the infection according to the Govt policy. We feel this is very tough time, especially for those who are pregnant and their family members. We are trying our best to support them via phone and Whatsapp.
Thank you again for your kind words of appreciation.

After 2 years of his consultation we got to hear good news and blessed with a baby boy. I'm very thankful to him. I would highly recommend him for consultation related to pregnancy issues. He is very helpful with a great personality. Thank you so much once again Sir.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback. Thanks a lot for having faith on our treatment even when we failed.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
context: Caesarean Section (C Section),Tubectomy/Tubal Ligation,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
Going through childbirth is mix of immense pain followed by happiness. In this journey, the presence of a wonderful doctor is simply priceless. Thanks Dr. Sujoy Dasguptafor comforting us and taking way all our stress. It was a great privilege and an unforgettable experience to have met you 3 years ago, when we were gifted our 1st baby under your guidance. So we did not think twice to visit you again after getting the news of 2nd pregnancy. The littlest feet make the biggest footprints in our heart and you are the pacemaker wrapped with kindness and caring nature. It was the humanity and brotherly love rather than professionalism showed by you throughout this journey. You may not know what you did for us, because we are now one of the happiest families with 2 children born in your hands i.e. garden of humanity. May your days be full of good health just like you help all of us. We will be forever grateful to you. With lots of love and respect…..
                                   Mr. & Mrs. Mahanti
reply_text: Dear Mr and Mrs Mohanti, our words really fall short to describe our gratitude. You kept unconditional trust on our treatment in both the pregnancies. The word "thank you" is too small for you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We became a bit frustated as I was yet to conceive after 5 years of our marriage. We went to a renowned gynaecologist of Kolkata to resolve the issue. But the Doctor gave us very little time in each seating and it seemed that the problem, whatever it is with me, remained unsolved after more than a year. Then a colleague of my husband suggested us about Dr Sujoy Dasgupta (from now on, I will address him as 'Sir'). We visited Sir at Garia, Friends Diagnostics. From the first day, Sir was very supportive and thorough, he consulted with us like a friend, giving all the possible options. The problem for which I was unable to conceive till that time, was identified by Sir within a week. After then, following his advice, I became pregnant which was an amazing experience. 
As my hometown is Krishnanagar, we could not visit Sir after lockdown, but he was always there whenever we required advices. I am unfortunate that I was unable to have Sir beside me during the most important incident of my life, due to pandemic situation, but I know it is his blessings that leads us to our parenthood.
******** * **** ******* ** **** *** ** ******** ***** *** ****** * **** *** *** ** ***** ***** Thank you very much Sir.
reply_text: Dear Mrs Mitra, we are keeping "Reply" section "empty" because we do not have words to express our gratitude to your kind appreciation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
It was month of March'2020, when I came to know that my wife is pregnant. We went to Dr. Sujoy Dasgupta with lots of anxiety, curiosity, tension(for covid-19) along with good feeling.We never faced any difficulties as we always used to receive proper and promt advice offline as well as online(via whatsapp text message) all the way of this special journey.We want to give you special thanks for your mental support and splendid behaviour during this covid-19 period. Finally the day has come on 09th November'2020. We are blessed with our "Little Angel".  Dr. Dasgupta is just awesome with his talent, experience, behaviour and knowledge. 
Thank you very much sir for holding our hand in this journey and to give us our 'MAA LAXMI' with your Magic Hand.
reply_text: Dear Mr Ghosh, it is quite usual for the women and their family members to have queries regarding pregnancy particularly if it is the first one. Our job is to support them to allay anxiety. Because of Covid-19, the situation has become more difficult. Therefore we try our best to support them as far as feasible. We thank you for relying on our treatment throughout the pregnancy. Thanks a lot.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: As a common layman we approached Dr Sujoy Dasgupta for infertility treatment. Right from the very outset Dr Dasgupta appeared more as a friend than a doctor. We would never ever forget how a person can become larger-than-life by sheer sincerity and cordiality. Today, as the parent of two male children, we can't help appreciating the approach, the care, love and guidance, as and when required, bestowed upon us by Dr Dasgupta...And we promise to teach our generation next how one has to be GOOD intrinsically to become great in any field of profession...Thank you Sir...thank you so much for always being there...
reply_text: Really we are overwhelmed. No words are enough to express our gratitude for you and your family, not only for this kind review, but also for unconditional faith on us throughout the treatment phase. We cannot use the word "Thank you" because we cannot. Lots of blessings for the babies.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was under Dr Dasgupta's guidance from the very first day of my pregnancy. He guided me thoroughly stating the pros and cons as I was pre diabetic for a long time by then. I had endometriosis, uterine fibroid and later polyhydramnios was detected at 36 weeks. However Doctor handled my case very smoothly treating me with bare minimum medicines and sincerely operated me in the last week of July to bring my little angel on this earth. He was very helpful and replied to all the queries as required. Thank you doctor.
reply_text:
Dear Mrs Roy, thank you so much for your kind review. We believe in minimum intervention and that's why we want to minimise the use of medicines. 
Diabetes in pregnancy can cause serious problems for both the mother and the baby. That's why we want to make our patients alert about the complications of diabetes. Thank you for following our advice religiously and having faith on our treatment. Thanks a lot 🙏

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We were very scared when covid cases returned in later half of my wife' pregnancy. But dr.Sujoy Dasgupta stand by us in this difficult time as he stand by us throughout my pregnancy period..he is such a humble kind *** ************* ****** **** even a most scared person can feel assured by his words..during each visit he would hear every little concern with patience.throughout admission and hospital stay he was very much helpful..even his ot skill and his surgical team was very helpful and skillful.my wife did not feel much pain after ot compared to other mother in same hospital. My wife started walking and normal food the very next day which was quite early in ceasarian section..I will definitely recommend him to anyone as my personal experience with him.THANK YOU DR. SUJOY DASGUPTA FROM CORE OF OUR HEART
reply_text:
Dear Mr Mondal, we always believe in empowering our patients and that's why we want to provide all sorts of information and address their concerns, so that they can take their own decision. 
Of course, the situation is worrisome for the patients at the time of Covid but we try to reassure them as far as possible. Come what may, we will always be there with you. 
Regarding our team, we are very much proud of our anaesthetists and Paediatrician because they always keep patient's comfort and safety in their priority. We always believe in "Enhanced Recovery" so that a patient can return to the normal life as soon as possible. 
Thank you so much for your unconditional faith on our treatment. Thanks a lot for your kind words of appreciation.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: Many thanks to Dr. Sujoy Dasgupta and his team for safe preterm delivery of our first child (March 2021). I would like to add few words of appreciation regarding my doctor’s support during my way towards motherhood. The consultation sessions were quick and precise and we never had to wait for long hours. Adequate attention was paid wherever required. At certain tensing situations (had issues with obesity, late age, gestational diabetes, preclampsia, IUGR, breech baby), Dr. Dasgupta supported us with sufficient information and assurance which were greatly relieving. Finally, the C-section surgery was successfully executed and all associated risks were properly addressed.
reply_text: Dear Mrs Singh, at the outset let us express our gratitude for giving us the opportunity to take care of you in high risk pregnancy. We always want to empower our patients by providing them sufficient information so that they can take their own decisions after understanding the risks and benefits. We are really happy to see our patients smiling after difficult journey. Thank you so much for taking your time to write this nice review. Thanks a lot.

reply_text: Dear Mrs Hazra, we believe pregnancy is not a disease, rather a transition in a woman's life. Therefore, we try not to impose unnecessary restrictions in pregnancy and encourage the women to lead normal life as far as possible. However, women suffer from lots of anxiety during pregnancy, especially during first pregnancy. Our duty is to explain them what is normal and what is not. Thank you for your believe in our treatment. Thanks a lot for your kind words of appreciation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Sujoy is extremely meticulous and caring. He goes through every single detail of medical history and suggests the solution.  His knowledge and confidence helped me feel reassured throughout pregnancy and then delivery.  He is very patient and explains everything multiple times if needed. Being a first time mother I felt very safe and secure with Sir and thank him immensely for the care and safe delivery of my baby boy.
reply_text: Dear Mrs Dash, thank you so much for your kind review. We think pregnancy is an important transitional stage in a woman's life. Naturally they remain under stress, especially if that is the first pregnancy. This is complicated by number of myths and misconceptions coming from friends and relatives. That's why we feel it's our duty to clear all the doubts and remove all the myths. We feel honoured that you gave us the opportunity to serve you. Thanks a lot.

reply_text: Our words fall short to express our gratitude for your blind faith on us. Whenever anybody blindly believes on us, it's our responsibility to prove that they are not blind. tags: Wait time,
review: *** ***** *** ***** ** ***** *** *** **** ************* **** *** ******* **** He is such a patient listener that he will never tell his patients to hurry up or leave fast because he dosent have time. reply_text: Dear Mr AB, Really we have no words to thank you for your kind words. What we did, was a part of our routine duty towards our patients. We feel it's very important not only to ask details of the patient's health condition but also to take care of how the disease is affecting the Patient and what is patient's view on the disease and treatment. This is called "Patient Centred Approach" in modern medicine. We arr here to guide you. A doctor cannot take decisions. It's only the patient who can decide the best for his/ her treatment, after weighing all merits and demerits. Our duty is to explain all the risks and benefits to the patient. Thank you so much. Enjoy your life.

He is just genius .. I must say he is magician .
 .. wonderful doctor with extra ordinary knowledge ..
reply_text: We believe that Doctor-patient relationship is a two way process. We have to keep mutual trust and respect. We are thankful to you for giving us the opportunity to serve you. Thanks a lot for having faith on our treatment. We appreciate your kind review amidst your busy schedule. Thanks a lot. Lots of love for your little bundle of joy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Sujoy Dasgupta is a very *****friendly and patient caring...His response is so good,even I had called him at midnight and he responded me immediately...So he is very professional on his duty...Thanks..
reply_text:
We are feeling overwhelmed by your kind words. The results of infertility treatment are often unpredictable
 Many a times we feel failure. But we always try our best and fight the battle against infertility, keeping the couples on our side. Fortunately, in your case, we were able to succeed just after one month (We must admit, that's not always possible). But it was possible because both of you cooperated with us from the very beginning and relied on our words. Pregnancy is another journey. Unexpectedly this time we all were challenged with the pandemic, which we never anticipated. We feel it's difficult time for everyone but especially for pregnant women. We are trying our best by supporting them in phone and Whatsapp. However, we know we are not able to provide the ideal care at this moment. Nevertheless we thank you for your unconditional faith on us even in the difficult time. Thanks a lot.
